Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Scanning through, Verify Documents and Call Customer both appear twice in C001 and C003, and Call Customer appears twice in C002.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For Verify Documents: first occurrence is initial/primary verification, second is re-verification after document submission or post-adjustment. For Call Customer: first call is to request missing docs or clarify discrepancies, while the second is follow-up/confirmation.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Double-check: C001: only one Call Customer. C002: two Calls. C003: only one Call. So only C002 has two Calls. And C001/C003 have two Verifies.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Use Initial Document Verification for first occurrence and Re-verification for second occurrence of Verify Documents. For C002 Calls: Clarification Call and Confirmation Call.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: To be consistent across cases, better to use Initial Verification and Re-verification with context hints.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: For Verify Documents, the first instance is the primary check after request initiation, while the second occurs after additional documents or account adjustment, hence Re-verification.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Standardize to Initial Verification for first and Re-verification for second in C001 and C003. For C002 Call Customer: Clarification Call and Confirmation Call.
